Modules / Web framework

Modules / Web utils

  • squishy_cookies (‚≠ê15) - Easily sign and verify cookies.

Showcases / XML

  • Saleor Deno Merch (‚≠ê32) - A fork of the original Deno Merch e-commerce website, rebuilt with Saleor (‚≠ê22k).

Tools / XML

  • denopendabot - Dependabot for Deno projects.

Integrations / XML

  • Netlify Edge Functions - Edge Functions connect the Netlify platform and workflow.
  • Supabase Edge Functions - Edge Functions are server-side TypeScript functions, distributed globally at the edge.
  • Astro - Deploy a server-side rendered Astro site to Deno Deploy.

entry.title: Awesome Deno Updates on Aug 02, 2021
entry.content:
Tools / XML

  • dvm
    • asdf-community/asdf-deno - Deno plugin for asdf
    • justjavac/dvm (‚≠ê684) - Deno Version Manager: manage multiple active Deno versions.
    • axetroy/dvm (‚≠ê168) - Version manger for Deno without runtime dependencies.
    • dvm.cmd (‚≠ê2) - Deno Version Manager for Windows. Written as a single batch file.
    • ghosind/dvm (‚≠ê49) - A lightweight Deno Version Manager for Linux/MacOS.

entry.title: Awesome Deno Updates on May 31, 2021
entry.content:
Modules / Utils

  • buckets (‚≠ê25) - Bundle assets and scripts in a single executable file.

entry.title: Awesome Deno Updates on May 29, 2021
entry.content:
Modules / CLI utils

  • kia (‚≠ê53) - Simple terminal spinners for Deno ü¶ï
  • terminal_images (‚≠ê53) - A Deno module and CLI tool for displaying images in the terminal.

Modules / Database

  • denodb (‚≠ê1.9k) - MySQL, SQLite, MariaDB, PostgreSQL and MongoDB ORM for Deno.
  • dsddb (‚≠ê13) - A dead simple persistant key-value database utilizing the JSON format.
  • dso (‚≠ê92) - A simple ORM library based on mysql.
  • postgres (‚≠ê636) - Driver for PostgreSQL database.
  • sql-builder (‚≠ê55) - An sql query builder.

Modules / Frontend development

  • postcss (‚≠ê58) - A tool for transforming styles with JS plugins.

Modules / Frontend framework

  • aleph.js (‚≠ê5.2k) - A React framework in Deno, inspired by Next.js.

Modules / Mail

  • deno-smtp (‚≠ê81) - A smtp mail sender for deno.

Modules / Markdown

  • marked (‚≠ê9) - Markdown-to-HTML converter.

Modules / String utils

  • camelcase (‚≠ê8) - Convert a dash/dot/underscore/space separated string to camelCase: foo-bar ‚Üí fooBar.
  • deno_case_style (‚≠ê4) - String validator and formater for different case style. eg: camelCase etc.
  • deno-prettystring (‚≠ê7) - Format, trim and remove extra white spaces between characters from string.
  • deno-slugify (‚≠ê19) - A string slugifier for deno.
  • normalize_diacritics (‚≠ê14) - Remove accents/diacritics in string.

Modules / Template engine

  • deno_tiny_templates (‚≠ê6) - Template renderer for deno.
  • eta (‚≠ê1.5k) - Fast, lightweight, and configurable embedded template engine.

Modules / Testing

  • deno-puppeteer (‚≠ê458) - A library which provides a high-level API to control Chromium or Chrome over the DevTools Protocol.
  • expect (‚≠ê46) - Helpers for writing jest like expect tests in deno.
  • merlin (‚≠ê50) - Testing and Benchmarking framework for deno üßô‚Äç‚ôÇÔ∏è
  • pretty_benching (‚≠ê25) - A small library to make your Deno benchmarking progress and results look pretty.
  • rhum (‚≠ê93) - A lightweight testing framework for Deno.
  • superdeno (‚≠ê124) - Super-agent driven library for testing Deno HTTP servers.
  • superoak (‚≠ê120) - HTTP assertions for Oak made easy via SuperDeno.
  • tincan (‚≠ê37) - A Jest-like testing library for Deno.
  • unexpected (‚≠ê371) - Extensible BDD assertion toolkit.

Modules / Utils

  • bytes_formater (‚≠ê8) - Format bytes (Uint8Array, ArrayBufferView, etc) output, useful when debugging IO functions.
  • coffee (‚≠ê33) - Deno Configuration - a type-safe, easy to use Deno config manager.
  • computed_types (‚≠ê362) - Joi like validators for Typescript and Deno.
  • dcc (‚≠ê11) - Deno Cache Clean, reloading deps when next running.
  • type-fest (‚≠ê14) - A collection of essential TypeScript types (port of sindresorhus/type-fest).
  • watch (‚≠ê44) - A file watcher.
  • wu-diff-js (‚≠ê18) - A diff library to compute differences between two slices using wu(the O(NP)) algorithm.

Modules / Web framework

  • aqua (‚≠ê217) - A minimal and fast web framework for Deno.
  • drash (‚≠ê1.1k) - A REST microframework for Deno's HTTP server with zero dependencies.
  • opine (‚≠ê853) - Fast, minimalist web framework ported from ExpressJS.
    • opine-http-proxy (‚≠ê16) - Proxy middleware for Deno Opine HTTP servers.

Modules / WebSocket

  • dropper (‚≠ê27) - Custom event-based WebSockets framework for building real-time apps on Deno ü¶ï
  • websocket_server (‚≠ê10) - A WebSocket server library.

Modules / Web utils

  • compression (‚≠ê38) - Deno HTTP compression middleware.
  • djwt (‚≠ê233) - Make JSON Web Tokens (JWT) on Deno based on JWT and JWS specifications.
  • forwarded (‚≠ê9) - Deno port of forwarded library.
  • gentleRpc (‚≠ê45) - A JSON-RPC 2.0 TypeScript library for Deno and the browser.
  • gql (‚≠ê198) - Universal GraphQL HTTP middleware.
  • nats (‚≠ê174) - A Deno client for the NATS messaging system.
  • obsidian (‚≠ê760) - A native GraphQL caching client and server module.
  • qs (‚≠ê5) - A query string parser with nesting support.
  • router (‚≠ê55) - A high-performance basic router works anywhere.

Modules / Webview

  • webview (‚≠ê1.5k) - Deno bindings for webview, a tiny library for creating web-based desktop GUIs.

Modules / XML

  • deno-xml-parser (‚≠ê22) - Deno XML parser ported from segmentio/xml-parser.
  • sax-ts (‚≠ê20) - SAX-style XML parser ported from sax-js (‚≠ê1.1k).

Registries / XML

  • deno.land/x/ - The official 3rd party module registry.
